content:
The high representative of the EU on Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Josep Borrel, responded to news that the Russian rocket had hit Odessa at all near the place where the world leaders were at that time.

He is about itwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

"An irresponsible air attack on Odessa, when President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Greece Kiriakos Michotakis were housed, to honor the died as a result of the drilling of drone into a dwelling house on March 2, once again proves that Putin is indifferent to any norm and he wants escalation." , - said the EU Chief Diplomat.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Chairman of the Euro CouncilcommentedThe blow of the Russian Federation on Odessa and stated that it was more than doing the Kremlin.

The Chairman of the European Commission Ursula von der Liaan is decisiveShe condemnedRussia's rocket strike on Odessa.

Also Moldova President Mia SanduShe saidthat Russia's war against Ukraine poses a direct threat to common security in Europe.
title: The high representative of the EU responded to the missile stroke in Odessa: Moscow wants escalation
